price: 80. Celui Qui, à partir d’arbres verts, vous a donné le feu, et voilà que vous l’utilisez pour allumer.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلۡأَخۡضَرِ نَارٗا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنۡهُ تُوقِدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala lakum mina al-shajari al-akhḍari nāran fa-idhā antum min'hu tūqidūna
